ygData.subject: Enchant Silver on Team PvP when not a DE
ygData.msgSnippet: I am not a DE, but I want to begin making enchanted jewellry.  Any suggestions as to acquiring Enchant Silver on Tallon/Vallon Zek?  I am *not* going to make a
ygData.messageBody:
I am not a DE, but I want to begin making enchanted jewellry. Any
suggestions as to acquiring Enchant Silver on Tallon/Vallon Zek? I am
*not* going to make a mule character, but, is it possible, at lvl 8, to
use invisibility to sneak into Neriak, purchase the spell, and get out?
Is it advisable to wait until level 12 and the DE illusion? Or, is
neither approach safe, and should I just try to find a dark one willing
to betray their race for some platinum?
